edu.harvard.iq.dvn.core.web

Class SortableList

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.harvard.iq.dvn.core.web.SortableList
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClassificationList, DataverseGrouping, VarGroupUIList, VDCUIList

    public abstract class SortableList
extends Object
    The SortableList class is a utility class used by the data table paginator example.
